text: Cassadee Pope (born August 28, 1989) is an American country musician. She was the lead singer of the group Hey Monday. She started performing by herself in the early 2010s. Her song "Wasting all These Tears" was released in 2013. It received favorable reviews. Pope was born in West Palm Beach, Florida. ==References== Category:Country musicians from Florida Category:Musicians from Florida Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:People from West Palm Beach, Florida
title: Cassadee Pope
